title: 275: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 5 (A New “Threat” + BashBall + Another Unionization?)
itunes:title: 275: Katie’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 5 (A New “Threat” + BashBall + Another Unionization?)
description:
(CW: s*xual assault discussed) The Broads chat the latest Bachelorette episode but cannot get over the promo for the remainder of the season! They discuss theories for the upcoming episodes, getting to know the amazing Andrew S. more, Blake entering into the house, Blake and Katie’s date, the group date that should have never been, Franco!, Michael opening up about his wife to the men, the house turning on Hunter, Justin for Bachelor, and much more!

RAINN:National Resources for S*xual Assault Survivors: https://www.rainn.org/national-resources-sexual-assault-survivors-and-their-loved-ones

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***GIRLFRIEND COLLECTIVE: Girlfriend Collective is offering first-time customers $25 off purchases of $100 or more at GIRLFRIEND.COM/CHATTY

***PRETTY LITTER: go to PRETTYLITTER.COM and use promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

***THIRD LOVE: Go to THIRDLOVE.COM/CHATTY now to get 20% off your first purchase!

***CARE/OF: For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50

 

VOTE FOR US FOR PEOPLE’S CHOICE PODCAST AWARDS!

Vote here for “Best Comedy Podcast” + “Best Female Hosted Podcast”: https://www.podcastawards.com/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
